channel.title: Adding shops to server
channel.description:
ok well i added the shop person in to the server in the autospawn how to i make him sell things
please help and i did do a serch and didn't find anything

item.title: Adding shops to server
item.dc:creator: @soul_extange soul extange
item.description:
@soul_extange wrote:

[quote=“The Prodigyscape, post:3, topic:183402”][quote author=soul extange link=topic=245078.msg2068422#msg2068422 date=1203570552]
i once had a server that had a shop maker.
it worked fine.
its posted on the moparscape downloads section on the forum’s.
its a funscap3 server.
[/quote]

He’d also need the void to write to client.java ?
Or was that all included in the download readme or something?[/quote]didnt think of that sry.and no there is none.

Read full topic
